body_html: @mufusu - @xiejw mentioned that the behavior is different in distributed mode, perhaps those arguments aren't the same in that case. I haven't tested that exporter in distributed mode. Glancing at the source I can't see where exactly it differs. You could try running your trainer in local mode to see if it works there?

body: @mufusu - @xiejw mentioned that the behavior is different in distributed mode, perhaps those arguments aren't the same in that case. I haven't tested that exporter in distributed mode. Glancing at the [source](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/estimator/training.py#L910) I can't see where exactly it differs. You could try running your trainer in local mode to see if it works there?
